show_name: I Can't Understand What My Husband Is Saying (TV)
other_title: Danna ga Nani o Itteiru ka Wakaranai Ken (Japanese)
旦那が何を言っているかわからない件 (Japanese)
plot: Kaoru is a serious office lady who's passionate about her job. Her husband Hajime, on the other hand, is a hard-core otaku who lives a nearly shut-in lifestyle. Kaoru worries about her husband, but they get along better than you'd think.
ending_theme: "Ii Kagen ni Shite, Anata" (いいかげんにして、あなた;Cut It Out, Dear) by Yukari Tamura & Kenichi Suzumura
